thread.title: Sourav Ganguly promises to revamp Eden Gardens in 3 months
thread.title_full: Sourav Ganguly promises to revamp Eden Gardens in 3 months - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sourav Ganguly promises to revamp Eden Gardens in 3 months
text:
* Kolkata :* Former India skipper Sourav Ganguly on Thursday officially took over as president of the Cricket Association of Bengal (CAB) and promised to revamp the iconic Eden Gardens ground in three months.*Sourav Ganguly*
Addressing the media, minutes after his unanimous election to the top post at a Special General Meeting ... Â»
